mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishitem (wishitem_seq, user_seq, user_id, model_name, wish_start_date, wish_end_date, amount_money) VALUES ( wishitem_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userNumber}, #{userId}', #{modelName}, To_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), To_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), amountMoney)
mapper.select: SELECT w.wishitem_seq, w.user_seq, w.user_id, w.model_name, to_char(w.wish_start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') wish_start_date, to_char(w.wish_end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') wish_end_date, w.amount_money, m.model_picture, m.model_type, m.model_fuel_type FROM wishitem w xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxc left outer join model m ON w.model_name = m.model_name WHERE wishitem_seq = #{value}

SELECT w.wishitem_seq, w.user_seq, w.user_id, w.model_name, TO_CHAR(w.wish_start_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') wish_start_date, TO_CHAR(w.wish_end_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') wish_end_date, w.amount_money, m.model_picture, m.model_type, m.model_fuel_type FROM wishitem w left outer join model m ON w.model_name = m.model_name WHERE user_id = #{value}
